author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Scandinavian Tobacco Group buys business Of Thompson and Co. Of Tampa, Inc
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Scandinavian Tobacco Group A/S :
* REG-SCANDINAVIAN TOBACCO GROUP A/S: SCANDINAVIAN TOBACCO GROUP ACQUIRES A LEADING US ONLINE CIGAR RETAILER
* ‍ACQUISITION IS EXPECTED TO HAVE A POSITIVE IMPACT ON GROUP‘S ADJUSTED EBITDA DURING 2019​
* SAYS SIGNED AN AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE BUSINESS OF THOMPSON AND CO. OF TAMPA, INC
* ‍PURCHASE PRICE AMOUNTS TO USD 62 MILLION AND ACQUISITION WILL BE FINANCED BY EXISTING CASH AT HAND​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
